name: Dashicons â€” WordPress Icons (WordPress Administration)
description:
More than 345 icons from the Dashicons Icons set.

Dashicons is used by WordPress within the administration.


Find the icon thanks to the search and get HTML/SVG code from here: https://developer.wordpress.org/resource/dashicons/


Made by Geoffrey Crofte (https://twitter.com/geoffreycrofte) with the help of the great project Iconify (https://iconify.design/)
